net.aksingh.owmjapis.core

Class OWM

  • net.aksingh.owmjapis.core.OWM
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OWMPro

    public class OWM

    Starting point for this lib. If you're new to this API, start from this class.

    Lets you access data from OpenWeatherMap.org using its Weather APIs (Free).

    Sample code in Java: OWM owm = new OWM("your-free-api-key");

    Sample code in Kotlin: val owm: OWM = OWM("your-free-api-key")

    OpenWeatherMap.org OpenWeatherMap.org APIs

    See Also:
    OpenWeatherMap.org, OpenWeatherMap.org APIs

    • Constructor Detail

      • OWM

        public OWM(java.lang.String apiKey)

        Constructor

        Defaults: Search accuracy is set to like Defaults: Unit is set to standard Defaults: Language is set to English Defaults: Proxy is set to system's proxy

        OpenWeatherMap.org API key

        Parameters:
        apiKey - API key (free) from OpenWeatherMap.org
        See Also:
        OpenWeatherMap.org API key
